Dear @Pradeep Poojary <mailto:pradeep.poojary@unic-nasco.com> ,

Please find attached the claim form for the delivered damaged items for the months of May /June 2025 from the Riyadh warehouse, with the 10% discount already applied. All the required supporting documents have been uploaded to the link below. Kindly note that the link will expire within 7 days:
